sponsor: Shahid Beheshti University of Medical Sciences
briefTitle: Study of the Effect of omega3 on Biomarkers of Cardiac Necrosis (CKMB and Troponin I) and Inflammation Marker (CRP) After Elective Percutaneous Coronary Intervention (PCI)
officialTitle: Phase 3 Study of Poly Unsaturated Fatty Acids of Omega 3 as an Anti Platelet Agent on Biomarkers of Cardiac Necrosis Including CKMB and Troponin I and Inflammation Marker CRP
summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the effect of omega 3 on biomarkers of cardiac necrosis(CKMB and troponin I) and inflammation marker CRP.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 8 and 24 hrs after percutaneous coronary intervention
